CustomField.description: Represents the Start Time in plain text format to enable including in Outbound Messages delivered to the Dispatch System. Salesforce Outbound Messages do not currently support 'Time' data type. Note that 'Z' is appended at the end to make it consistent with the Time field format.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Represents the Start Time in plain text format.
CustomField.label: Start Time (Text)
